name: Sword World SFC
overview: Sword World SFC is a Super Famicom (the SFC in the title refers to the Super Famicom) adaptation of Sword World RPG, a fantasy RPG table-top game. The game is open-ended and intended for multiplayer play in order to recreate the table-top game as closely as possible. This also includes a faithful recreation of the table-top game's ruleset.
